if not MyFrame then MyFrameText = "Starting Profile..." MyFrame = CreateFrame("Frame") MyFrame:ClearAllPoints() MyFrame:SetBackdrop(StaticPopup1:GetBackdrop()) MyFrame:SetHeight(80) MyFrame:SetWidth(270)
MyFrame.text = MyFrame:CreateFontString(nil, "BACKGROUND", "GameFontGreen") MyFrame.text:SetFontObject("GameFontNormal") MyFrame.text:SetAllPoints() MyFrame.text:SetText(MyFrameText) MyFrame:SetPoint("CENTER", 0, -150) MyFrame.text:SetTextColor(0, 1, 0, 1) MyFrame:SetBackdropBorderColor(1, 0, 0, 1)
CreateFrame("Frame","Test",UIParent) Test:SetWidth(90) Test:SetHeight(90) Test:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", MyFrame, -10, 4) Test:CreateTexture("TestTexture") TestTexture:SetAllPoints() TestTexture:SetTexture("Interface\\TargetingFrame\\UI-PVP-HORDE")
RateFrame = CreateFrame("Frame") RateFrame:ClearAllPoints() RateFrame:SetBackdrop(nil) RateFrame:SetHeight(60) RateFrame:SetWidth(200) RateFrame.text = RateFrame:CreateFontString(nil, "BACKGROUND", "GameFontNormal") RateFrame.text:SetAllPoints() RateFrame.text:SetText("https://rocketr.net/sellers/Tarud for new products") RateFrame:SetPoint("CENTER", MyFrame, 0, -50) RateFrame:SetBackdropBorderColor(1, 0, 0, 1)
ByFrame = CreateFrame("Frame") ByFrame:ClearAllPoints() ByFrame:SetBackdrop(nil) ByFrame:SetHeight(60) ByFrame:SetWidth(140) ByFrame.text = ByFrame:CreateFontString(nil, "BACKGROUND", "GameFontNormal") ByFrame.text:SetAllPoints() ByFrame.text:SetText("1-60 Horde Remake 33-41") ByFrame:SetPoint("CENTER", MyFrame, 0, 47) ByFrame:SetBackdropBorderColor(1, 0, 0, 1)
MyFrame:SetMovable(true) MyFrame:EnableMouse(true) MyFrame:SetScript("OnMouseDown",function() MyFrame:StartMoving() end) MyFrame:SetScript("OnMouseUp",function() MyFrame:StopMovingOrSizing() end)
Test:SetMovable(true) Test:EnableMouse(true) Test:SetScript("OnMouseDown",function() MyFrame:StartMoving() end) Test:SetScript("OnMouseUp",function() MyFrame:StopMovingOrSizing() end)
RateFrame:SetMovable(true) RateFrame:EnableMouse(true) RateFrame:SetScript("OnMouseDown",function() MyFrame:StartMoving() end) RateFrame:SetScript("OnMouseUp",function() MyFrame:StopMovingOrSizing() end)
ByFrame:SetMovable(true) ByFrame:EnableMouse(true) ByFrame:SetScript("OnMouseDown",function() MyFrame:StartMoving() end) ByFrame:SetScript("OnMouseUp",function() MyFrame:StopMovingOrSizing() end)
MyFrame.Close = CreateFrame("BUTTON", nil, MyFrame, "UIPanelCloseButton") MyFrame.Close:SetWidth(20) MyFrame.Close:SetHeight(20) MyFrame.Close:SetPoint("TOPRIGHT", MyFrame, 3, 3) MyFrame.Close:SetScript("OnClick", function() MyFrame:Hide() Test:Hide() RateFrame:Hide() ByFrame:Hide() DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("|cFF8AFF40MyFrame is now CLOSED|r |cFFFC7DFFType /MyFrame|r |cFF8AFF40In Game to OPEN it again!|r") end)
SLASH_WHATEVERYOURFRAMESARECALLED1="/MyFrame" SlashCmdList.WHATEVERYOURFRAMESARECALLED = function() if MyFrame:IsShown() then MyFrame:Hide() Test:Hide() RateFrame:Hide() ByFrame:Hide() else MyFrame:Show() Test:Show() RateFrame:Show() ByFrame:Show() end end end
DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("|cFF0DB3FF Thanks for purchasing Andoido's 1-60 Horde REMAKE (Profile 44 + ) - Checkout my other work! https://rocketr.net/sellers/Tarud |r")
